metadata.title: CVE-2019-18391 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow in the vrend_renderer_transfer_write_iovfunction in vrend_renderer.c in virglrenderer through 0.8.0 allows guest OSusers to cause a denial of service via VIRGL_CCMD_RESOURCE_INLINE_WRITEcommands.

criterions.comment: virglrenderer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
